name: Ave Maria Rocks: Choir of Spray
riddle: Pray to the tide; it counts without fingers.

renderSpec.prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 5 plumes, 2 rosaries, 1 locket.. sacred_rocks_spray_choir_devotion with towering_spray_coral_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_rocks_midground_spray_foreground_rosaries. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: coral_rosary_crafts, maritime_devotion. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
